did.unittitle: Henry George Tract Society Land and Labor Library Leaflets,
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Leaflets published by the Henry George Tract Society in Endwell, New York.

bioghist.p: The Henry George Tract Society was based in Endwell, New York.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of six leaflets published by the Henry George Tract Society in Endwell, New York.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Henry George Tract Society Land and Labor Library Leaflets #5824m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: Numbers 14, 26, 35, 53, and 54, and "The Greatest Discovery of Modern Times."
